body.name: E17 LED Under Microwave Over Stove Light Bulb 125V Appliance 8206232A 40W Incandescent Equivalent, E17 Intermediate Base 3W Dimmable Light Bulb for Refrigerators, Range Hood, Daylight 4000K, 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 49 mins
features: [ EASY TO INSTALL ]: This E17 LED dimmable bulb with small size (2.3*0.87inch) is perfect for replacing commonly used under microwave over stove light bulbs with E17 bases, such as for top name brands Whirlpool, GE, Samsung，Frigidaire, Amana, Maytag, KitchenAid, Kenmore, Magic Chef, LG, Panasonic, Caloric, Hardwick,etc

[ DETAILA& Wide Application ] :125V / 3W E17 appliance light bulb (40W Halogen Replacement) / 400 lumens/ E17 Intermediate Base /daylight 4000K/ glass cover, bulb size:2.3 inch(Length) X 0.87 inch(Diameter) , perfectly suits different small household appliances including microwaves, refrigerators, ovens, fans, sewing machines,range hood, etc

[ 90% ENERGY-SAVING ]：Each E17 Microwave Oven LED light Bulb gives 40 watt brightness for only 3 watts of electricity usage, can save over saving 90% of your electricity bill and energy, and lowering energy consumption while better lighting performance, This is a dimmable E17 bulb and works great without flickering even on the lower or higher setting

[ HIGHT CRI ] : These E17 microwave over stove lamps with daylight 4000K are super bright, perfect color rendering (CRI>85) bulbs are solving your low light problems, and helping when you need to test brownness on homemade foods

[ PERFECT QUALITY ] :These E17 oven light bulbs are made of high-quality Ceramic lamp body and glass cover with good heat dissipation, Safe and non-conductive, 360° uniform light emission with good light efficiency, overheating (working temperature range -4℉~130℉) and overload protect.full inspection before shipment of all E17 LED microwave light bulbs under hood, 2 year warranty if any products’ issue or questions, and 24hours online service to solve customers’ worries.
body.description: These E17 LED Under Microwave Over Stove Light Bulbs 125V 3W Appliance 8206232A 40W Incandescent Equivalent are perfect for replacing commonly used under microwave over stove light bulbs with E17 bases, such as top name brands Whirlpool, GE, Samsung，Frigidaire, Amana, Maytag, KitchenAid, Kenmore, Magic Chef, LG, Panasonic, Caloric, Hardwick,etcWide Application: Each E17 Microwave Oven LED light Bulb gives 40 watt brightness for only 3 watts of electricity usage can save over saving 90% of your electricity bill and energy perfectly suits different small household appliances for microwaves (such as for GE over counter microwave,Panasonic Jr. microwave, Whirlpool over-the-range microwave,Samsung ME16H702SES Microwave), Refrigerators, Range Hood, Ovens, Fans, Sewing Machines, etcSpecification: Name: E17 LED microwave bulbs Base: E17 Intermediate Base (T7 Intermediate Base) Voltage: 110-130V Color Temperature: daylight 4000K Power: 3W Lumen: 400Lm Color Rendering Index(CRI): >85 (let you see the color you supposed to be seen) Material: Glass& Ceramic lamp body Dimmable: Dimmable Beam angle: 360 degrees Size: 2.3 inch(Length) X 0.87 inch(Diameter) Life Span: 25000-30000hrsPrecautions: 1.If you find the E17 refrigerator bulb don't work. please try to screwed them in all the way, sometimes the back stem is a little short for few old lamp socket so you have to screw the bulb all the way in to get a full connection, if the E17 refrigerator bulb still don’t work, please contact us at anytime. 2.Be sure to cut off the power supply Before starting the installation 3.These E17 microwave over stove lamps with daylight 4000K are super bright, perfect color rendering bulbs are solving your low light problems, and helping when you need to test brownness on homemade foods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit to replace HOT halogen bulbs.
reviews.reviewText: Fits standard over-range microwaves. Screw in, less heat, bright light. Cant ask for anything more. A little pricy...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and lasts forever
reviews.reviewText: We have a microwave where the switch is stuck and the light is always on. After burning out an OEM halogen bulb, we bought these. The first one is still burning bright months later and it's on 24 hours a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much brighter than original
reviews.reviewText: I like the energy save and how bright they are in comparison to the original set. They do dim and provide better colors for the food that is being coked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and bright
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to replace the incandescent bulb in my over the stove microwave. It was very easy to install, and I love how bright it is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars should be brighter
reviews.reviewText: I actually thought they would be brighter. easy to install. overall, i'm satisfied, but, i would prefer them to be brighter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will Work As Expected If...
reviews.reviewText: I bought the warm white and am very pleased. The brightness is perfect for me.To be 100% sure these bulbs will work with your microwave, listen for a click sound when you press the light button. Ignore the beep and carefully listen for a click. If you here something other than the beep, these bulbs will work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and solid refrigerator light replacement
reviews.reviewText: Excellent 2-pack of lights! I needed a reliable, clear light to replace my dead refrigerator bulb. Even with just one bulb, the light in my fridge was easy on the eyes and allowed everything to be seen clearly. I wouldn't mind a notch or two brighter, but it's still more than fine.If you're looking for an affordable fridge light replacement with these specs, then definitely snap these up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect for two level lighting under microwave.
